issue.title: [Doc] Regenerate CHANGELOG.md to include all versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14490](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14490). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since the move to release branches we haven't been updating the CHANGELOG.md file on the main branch so the versions are missing begining from release 3.0.0.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14490?focusedCommentId=17435324) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11560
